TopicTitle: Looking for large ISS solar panels

Articles.Content: I'm looking for the large solar panels in the pic below. Most of the parts in that pic belong to the Kosmos mod, but the large solar panel isn't in it. I think it's based on the ISS solar panels.
Last time I had the Kosmos pack those solar panels were indeed in it. They were buggy though they didn't like to open fully.
Those are indeed the "Balka Solar Wing Array" panels from KOSMOS. Use them on everything, even though they almost always break because they require so much space.
I think I had an older version, which I thought was the latest. Found it now.

Last time I had the Kosmos pack those solar panels were indeed in it. They were buggy though they didn't like to open fully.

To open those solar panels, right click it and press the lower "extend panels" button only. Then, after its done extending, press the other "extend panels" to align it to the sun.
